column5: Can you purchase the Outdoor Card at any bait shop, if not were can you purchase it?
Yep, purchase it at the same time as your license. Scott
Here's a web site that probably provides all the information you require:http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business...02_165323.html
you can get it by phone. I live in Indiana and I received mine in about a week.
